'''Machine Hunter''' is [[Aloy]]'s Default [[Character Outfit]].

==Appearance==
<!-- Keep appearance section short and concise. Limit to 1-2 paragraphs (preferably 1 paragraph) with 3-4 sentences each. -->
Aloy's outfit in ''Genshin Impact'' appears to be based on her [[w:c:horizon:Nora Brave|Nora Brave]] outfit from ''Horizon Zero Dawn''.
